app_name: Boxing King Fury 2019 PRO: Boxing Fighting Club
app_detail:
No one born as a champion but they made theirself! You've the chance to made yourself as a great boxer in this world through this game. Welcome to the world of boxing & kung Fu masterâ€™s 2019 game. This is mixed Thai and US boxing fighting styles game that will experience you as tough martial art master. Unleash your boxer and reveal kung Fu tiger to the world of martial art? 


Letâ€™s jump into the epic world of free martial art & boxing fighting game. Begin as a boxing tiger, but end as a martial art legend. Boxing bossesâ€™ stances, blocks, strikes, punches. Use various combinations of amazing fighting attacks that get ready you for battle. Put all the boxing moves and martial art attacks youâ€™ve learned in training. Fight to survive among bosses such as other boxing masters and competitors. The wide range of fun and exciting missions will give you an unforgettable boxing fighting experience and thrill of martial art adventures. Your rivals use various fighting styles including taekwondo, Muay Thai, kung Fu, boxing and other. Show your top level fighting skills to overcome all of bosses with the power of kung Fu & shadow boxing tiger claw style. Take timely decision, attack on martial art bosses with punches and kicks on accurately and quickly. In kung Fu there are lot of blockage skills to defend yourself from enemy attack.


Players and Weapon Selection: 
Select the best martial art boxer to win all boxing fights and become the world kung Fu master. Multiple players are available with different fighting skills. You may select any of them based on your improvement in the game. There are 10 different fighting missions with 4 different players. Each fight rewards good amount of coins through which you may change your player for fighting & unlock weapons like dagger, sword and katana. Use multiple weapons against all fighters cleverly and defeat them badly to win the color belts in this real boxing & kung Fu fighting game. 


Get ready for endless martial art warriors fighting adventure and enjoy the both boxing and kung Fu warrior experience. This is your time to show that your fists and feet of fury are stronger than any weapon. You are the sole boxing master of your destiny, so take it as life biggest challenge. Show no mercy to those who challenging and standing in your way. There would be only one champion in boxing tournament. Fight like a shadow boxer or kung Fu ninja, or just become world boxing master. Feel the addictive and totally realistic boxing combat skill. Advanced animation and stunning 3d graphics will bring the real ninja fighting experience in your android device, while intuitive touchscreen controls make jab, hook, and uppercut feel natural and fun.


Boxing King Fury 2019 PRO: Boxing Fighting Club Game Features:


ğŸ¥Š Choose among 4 different types of martial art players.
ğŸ¥Š Challenging 7 expert levels with color belts
ğŸ¥Š Ultimate experience of 10 different fighting missions
ğŸ¥Š Use multiple weapons (dagger, simple sword, katana etc.)
ğŸ¥Š Win fight against multiple boxing & kung Fu bosses
ğŸ¥Š Test the fighting skill before buy a new player
ğŸ¥Š Earn reward on every mission completion
ğŸ¥Š Get free coins or virtual currency to buy and unlock 
ğŸ¥Š Face & defeat different types of enemy rivals
ğŸ¥Š Intuitive and smooth touching screen controls
ğŸ¥Š Background music & sound effects will boost your energy
ğŸ¥Š Beautiful 3d environment to increase your fighting passion
